title: Jacket
description: black open front jacket with flared side openings; neck band reverses to purple; collages of separate embroidered squares and rectangles sewn on crosstitch field form 4 1/2 inch strips flanking front opening and extending down back whter they join print fabric at right ngles;  same scroll and floral embroidery motif form 8 1/2 inch patches on upper arms; multi-color; long blue cuffs; dark blue lining
